name: Epi- and hyperbenthic communities of Belgian sandy beaches
description: This is the first study on the epi-andhyperbenthic fauna of thesurf zone of sandy beaches of the Belgian coast. Therefore, as a first objective of this thesis, a lot of attention has been paid to the inventarisation(species composition), and to the investigation of the temporal and spatial distribution patterns of both communities. A temporal and a spatial campaign were performed during which the hyper- and epibenthos was sampled.
